articles.title: Video: Actor Vijay Sethupathi rebukes reporter over a question on Hindi - India Today
articles.description: Vijay Sethupathi and Katrina Kaif were in Chennai to attend the promotional event of their upcoming film, 'Merry Christmas'. At the event, Sethupathi schooled a reporter who asked him a loaded question about Hindi imposition.
articles.content: Actor Vijay Sethupathi, along with Katrina Kaif and director Sriram Raghavan, attended the promotional event of their upcoming film, 'Merry Christmas' in Chennai on January 7. At the press conference… [+2122 chars]
